description:
Train hard at home, so you can climb hard at the crag. The Beastmaker 2000 board is a great choice for seasoned hangboarders, as it has many 2- or 1-finger pockets to test the limits of your finger strength. The wooden construction is gentle on skin, so you can focus on your hangs instead of worrying about thin fingertips.

  • Made of fine-textured wood
  • 3 sets of flat slopers, 2 x 3-finger pockets, 4 sets of 2-finger pockets, 2 sets of monos, and plenty of edges
  • Comes with mounting hardware
  • Not recommended for beginners
name: Beastmaker Beastmaker 2000 Hangboard
